data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Bandarban, Chittagong, Bangladesh to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bandarban, Chittagong, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Bandarban, Chittagong, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 798 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Bandarban to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 486 believers in the county of Bandarban to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Mallik (Hindu traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please raise up prophets in Bandarban who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bandarban, Chittagong, Bangladesh not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bandarban, Chittagong, Bangladesh has a population of 388,300.

We estimate Bandarban has 486 people who might know Jesus, 1,165 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 386,649 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Bandarban, Chittagong, Bangladesh from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.
